Featured Foundational Projects

Foundational EDA Pandas Seaborn

Industrial Sensor Data Analysis

Deep-dive exploratory analysis of 16-channel gas sensor array with 65k+ timestamped readings. Identified cross-sensor correlations using heatmaps, quantified temporal drift with rolling statistics, and segmented response patterns by gas type.

65k+ readings 16 sensors 5 gases

View Analysis ‚Üí

Foundational Time Series ML Gradient Boosting

Energy Consumption Forecasting

Built and compared three forecasting models (Ridge, RF, GB) on 10-minute resolution energy data. Engineered temporal features, lag features (1h-1d), and rolling statistics. GB achieved R¬≤ 0.85+ with residual analysis.

20k samples R¬≤ 0.85+ 10min freq

View Analysis ‚Üí

Foundational ML Isolation Forest PCA

Multivariate Anomaly Detection

Implemented three strategies (Z-Score, Isolation Forest, PCA reconstruction) on 5-channel sensor streams. Detected point, contextual, and collective anomalies with 90%+ recall. Ensemble recommended for production.

3 methods 90%+ recall 5 channels

View Analysis ‚Üí

Featured Advanced Projects

Advanced EDA Transfer Entropy Wavelets

Advanced Sensor Data Analysis

Extended analysis with transfer entropy for causal inference between sensor pairs, wavelet decomposition for multi-scale temporal patterns, and dynamic time warping for pattern matching. Sophisticated signal processing beyond basic EDA.

Transfer Entropy Wavelets DTW

View Analysis ‚Üí

Advanced Time Series Deep Learning LSTM

Advanced Time Series Forecasting

Deep learning approaches with LSTM/GRU networks for sequence-to-sequence prediction. Compared with Prophet for automated seasonality detection. Feature engineering with Fourier transforms and external regressors.

LSTM Prophet Seq2Seq

View Analysis ‚Üí

Advanced Deep Learning VAE LSTM-AE

Advanced Anomaly Detection

Deep learning anomaly detection with Variational Autoencoders (VAE) and LSTM-Autoencoders for temporal anomalies. Comparison with classical methods. Bayesian approaches for uncertainty quantification in anomaly scores.

VAE LSTM-AE Bayesian

View Analysis ‚Üí

## Featured Foundational Projects {.section-title}

::: {.project-grid}

::: {.project-card}
::: {.card-tags}
<span class="tag tag-level">Foundational</span>
<span class="tag tag-primary">EDA</span>
<span class="tag tag-secondary">Pandas</span>
<span class="tag tag-secondary">Seaborn</span>
:::

### Industrial Sensor Data Analysis

Deep-dive exploratory analysis of 16-channel gas sensor array with 65k+ timestamped readings. Identified cross-sensor correlations using heatmaps, quantified temporal drift with rolling statistics, and segmented response patterns by gas type.

::: {.card-metrics}
<span class="metric"><strong>65k+</strong> readings</span>
<span class="metric"><strong>16</strong> sensors</span>
<span class="metric"><strong>5</strong> gases</span>
:::

<a href="projects/01_Sensor_Data_Analysis.ipynb" class="card-link">View Analysis ‚Üí</a>
:::

::: {.project-card}
::: {.card-tags}
<span class="tag tag-level">Foundational</span>
<span class="tag tag-primary">Time Series</span>
<span class="tag tag-ml">ML</span>
<span class="tag tag-secondary">Gradient Boosting</span>
:::

### Energy Consumption Forecasting

Built and compared three forecasting models (Ridge, RF, GB) on 10-minute resolution energy data. Engineered temporal features, lag features (1h-1d), and rolling statistics. GB achieved R¬≤ 0.85+ with residual analysis.

::: {.card-metrics}
<span class="metric"><strong>20k</strong> samples</span>
<span class="metric"><strong>R¬≤ 0.85+</strong></span>
<span class="metric"><strong>10min</strong> freq</span>
:::

<a href="projects/02_Time_Series_Forecasting.ipynb" class="card-link">View Analysis ‚Üí</a>
:::

::: {.project-card}
::: {.card-tags}
<span class="tag tag-level">Foundational</span>
<span class="tag tag-ml">ML</span>
<span class="tag tag-secondary">Isolation Forest</span>
<span class="tag tag-secondary">PCA</span>
:::

### Multivariate Anomaly Detection

Implemented three strategies (Z-Score, Isolation Forest, PCA reconstruction) on 5-channel sensor streams. Detected point, contextual, and collective anomalies with 90%+ recall. Ensemble recommended for production.

::: {.card-metrics}
<span class="metric"><strong>3</strong> methods</span>
<span class="metric"><strong>90%+</strong> recall</span>
<span class="metric"><strong>5</strong> channels</span>
:::

<a href="projects/03_Anomaly_Detection.ipynb" class="card-link">View Analysis ‚Üí</a>
:::

:::

## Featured Advanced Projects {.section-title}

::: {.project-grid}

::: {.project-card}
::: {.card-tags}
<span class="tag tag-advanced">Advanced</span>
<span class="tag tag-primary">EDA</span>
<span class="tag tag-secondary">Transfer Entropy</span>
<span class="tag tag-secondary">Wavelets</span>
:::

### Advanced Sensor Data Analysis

Extended analysis with transfer entropy for causal inference between sensor pairs, wavelet decomposition for multi-scale temporal patterns, and dynamic time warping for pattern matching. Sophisticated signal processing beyond basic EDA.

::: {.card-metrics}
<span class="metric"><strong>Transfer Entropy</strong></span>
<span class="metric"><strong>Wavelets</strong></span>
<span class="metric"><strong>DTW</strong></span>
:::

<a href="projects/01_ADV_Sensor_Data_Analysis.ipynb" class="card-link">View Analysis ‚Üí</a>
:::

::: {.project-card}
::: {.card-tags}
<span class="tag tag-advanced">Advanced</span>
<span class="tag tag-primary">Time Series</span>
<span class="tag tag-ml">Deep Learning</span>
<span class="tag tag-secondary">LSTM</span>
:::

### Advanced Time Series Forecasting

Deep learning approaches with LSTM/GRU networks for sequence-to-sequence prediction. Compared with Prophet for automated seasonality detection. Feature engineering with Fourier transforms and external regressors.

::: {.card-metrics}
<span class="metric"><strong>LSTM</strong></span>
<span class="metric"><strong>Prophet</strong></span>
<span class="metric"><strong>Seq2Seq</strong></span>
:::

<a href="projects/02_ADV_Time_Series_Forecasting.ipynb" class="card-link">View Analysis ‚Üí</a>
:::

::: {.project-card}
::: {.card-tags}
<span class="tag tag-advanced">Advanced</span>
<span class="tag tag-ml">Deep Learning</span>
<span class="tag tag-secondary">VAE</span>
<span class="tag tag-secondary">LSTM-AE</span>
:::

### Advanced Anomaly Detection

Deep learning anomaly detection with Variational Autoencoders (VAE) and LSTM-Autoencoders for temporal anomalies. Comparison with classical methods. Bayesian approaches for uncertainty quantification in anomaly scores.

::: {.card-metrics}
<span class="metric"><strong>VAE</strong></span>
<span class="metric"><strong>LSTM-AE</strong></span>
<span class="metric"><strong>Bayesian</strong></span>
:::

<a href="projects/03_ADV_Anomaly_Detection.ipynb" class="card-link">View Analysis ‚Üí</a>
:::
